dict.acceptation: 轻微地，轻轻地；细长地，苗条地；〈罕〉轻蔑地；粗；

sent.orig: Jordan's face was slightly cut glass, and also slightly injured in the head.
sent.trans: 陈小春的面部被玻璃轻微割伤，而头部也受轻伤。

sent.orig: Gold was slightly stronger, and silver slightly weaker.
sent.trans: 黄金略显坚挺。白银略显疲软。

sent.orig: As Rex took note the slightly parted Council door that now hung slightly off its hinges.
sent.trans: 雷克斯注意到了现在已有点从铰链上脱开的议会厅大门微微开启着。

sent.orig: Mandarin orange when you have just won, slightly bitter, slightly acid.
sent.trans: 瓯柑刚摘下时，略有苦味，稍酸。

sent.orig: In adults its contour may be straight, slightly concave or slightly convex.
sent.trans: 成人肺其形状可以是直的，轻微凹下或轻度突出。
